credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 4 1/4 in. (10.8 cm)
rim: 3 3/16 in. (8.1 cm)
Base: 1 11/16 in. (4.3 cm)
title: Beaker
description: Thick, natural greenish-blue glass. Cylindrical shape with slightly concave sides and thicker, rounded-off rim, flaring slightly. Floor slightly convex on interior. Solid pad base of same glass. Two tool marks on base. One coil of blue glass a third of the way down wall. Somewhat lopsided. Some incrustation and thin iridescent film on interior.
